titles.title: A concurrent resolution honoring the life and legacy of Ulysses S. Grant in commemoration of his 200th Birthday.
A concurrent resolution honoring the life and legacy of Ulysses S. Grant in commemoration of his 200th Birthday.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution honors Ulysses S. Grant for his efforts and leadership in defending the union of the United States and affirms that he is among the most influential military commanders in the history of the country.
